name: Off-Brand Hero
description:
SUBMISSION FOR VIMJAM 2020

Play as a cute kid transported to a world of imagination while trying to escape from her greatest enemy! While there, she will COLLECT the powers of various non-descript costumes and build confidence in herself until she can ultimately return to her home, confront the enemy, and make it THERE AND BACK AGAIN. 

If you're looking for secrets, try investigating the main villain a little more :)

Controller support is enabled so give it a go if that's your preference!
